reviews:
I bought this for the U/V feature, which worked perfectly fluorescing the U/V dye in my automotive A/C refrigerant while searching for a leak (turned out to be a bad valve core on the high pressure side). The U/V output is high enough to work even in fairly bright light, although direct sunlight makes the glowing dye a bit hard to see. The four modes supported by this flashlight are bright-white, dim-white, fast-flash, and U/V. The modes are changed by half-pressing the power button, or by turning the light off then back on again. This can make it a bit annoying to use simply as a bright flashlight since it will always turn on in the next mode following the one last used. If you use it in bright mode then turn it off, the next time you turn it on again you must cycle through dim-white, flashing, and U/V before you can get it back into bright white mode again. Other than that this has become my primary toolbox flashlight.

I have another similar metal "security" flashlight which I used to carry in my toolbox, but that one didn't have U/V. It DID, however, have more modes (bright, medium, low, fast-flash, morse S-O-S). It would have been nice if this flashlight had the same modes as my old one, plus U/V, but it's still a great light.

reviews:

review_title: Light died quickly, nonexistent customer service.
reviews:
Great light for the price. Very bright, and the focus feature works great. You can put a spotlight on something pretty far away.

The uv function works well on my glow golf discs; it charges them about as well as the 51-led for the same price, but with the added functionality of a great regular flashlight and the focus.

Edit: The light stopped functioning about a month after I purchased it. I had thought it should be no big deal, as the description says 1 year warranty. Unfortunately, I have received zero response from Morpilot to my many inquiries. The submission form on the Contact Us page on their website got no response. Tried sending an email; that got an autoresponse that the address is not functioning. Called their number; no answer and their voicemail is the stock one that the service provider supplies. No response. All told, I get the impression Morpilot is basically a dropshipping company selling rebranded cheap goods from China. It might work or it might not, but don't expect them to stand by their products if it doesn't.

review_title: Has multiple uses and works well. Highly recommended!
reviews:
This product is small, lightweight (but still feels durable), comes with a removable strap that is not shown on the pictures on this listing on Amazon. Otherwise, it looks exactly the same as shown on the pictures on the listing.

The UV light worked really well. I bought this product to test the UV protection of my sunglasses because I heard that the UV coating can wear out over time with use. In case you're interested, I did this by pointing the UV light on a currency (I used a US $5 bill) in a dark room and the security feature will glow. Place the lens of your sunglasses in front of the UV light and the security feature should disappear. If it's still there, the lenses of your sunglasses need to be replaced because it is not providing UV protection anymore.

The UV light also works well in detecting urine stains in your toilet. I used it on mine and help me know which areas I need to clean.

The flashlight feature also works well. There are three flashlight modes: bright, dim, and strobe (blinking). I read from one of the reviews that the strobe light is the morse code for SOS. I cannot understand morse code but if that is true, this flashlight is also great for emergencies especially when you are outdoors. But even if someone cannot understand morse code, the blinking lights will surely attract attention if you need help. The bright and dim lights can also zoom in and out.

One thing to note is that when you turn off the light, it will switch to the next mode the next time you turn it on. The modes in order are bright, dim, strobe, and UV. Thus, if you used the UV light prior to turning it off, it will switch to the bright light the next time you turn it on. It will be more convenient if the same mode is used the next time you turn it on. However, I've noted that it only takes a few seconds to switch back to the mode that you need.

reviews:
La linterna es de tamaño bolsillo, estupenda para llevar en el bolso para casos de emergencia. Tiene potencia suficiente para alumbrar de forma efectiva. Además añade un led de ultra violeta muy práctico para ver cosas que a simple vista no se ven, como pelos, manchas, etc..
También tiene una pinza para poder colocarla en el cinturón y tenerla a mano. Incluye las 3 pilas necesarias y un adaptador para una pila recargable. No lleva cargador. Dispones de dos intensidades de potencia de alumbrado además del modo UV.
La he comprado para un profesional de la seguridad espero que le sea de gran ayuda.
Os dejo unas fotos de la linterna y los accesorios que lleva.
Espero que os sea útil mi comentario.
Un saludo Toni.
product_name: Morpilot UV Flashlight, LED Handheld Flashlight 2 in 1 Black Light Flashlight Waterproof Blacklight Flashlights, LED UV Torch Urine Detector for Cats Pet Stains Bed Bugs Scorpions
rank:
#1,019 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#9 in Handheld Flashlights

reviews:
In contrast to the product description, this light is quite weak. The images are entirely misleading and do no represent the performance of this torch. This is particularly true of the image shown which makes the torch appear to create an arc of light orders of magnitude brighter than the it is actually capable of producing.
It does feel well build. It does have an adjustable beam. It does have both white and UV lights. As a basic low powered torch, it's fine. However, the hyperbole of the advertising is enough to make it unwise to buy it.

review_title: Not just for pet urine... o no!
reviews: Great price and build quality! I got this out of curiosity... and what a find! reviews:
(Mi esposa dice)

Parece estar elaborada con materiales de buena calidad; es pequeña, liviana y cómoda, para llevar a cualquier lugar y usarla incluso en caso de emergencia. Viene con un cordón para sostenerla de forma segura cuando se está usando y viene con un clip/pinza para colocar en el cinturón.

Tiene 4 modos de iluminación: brillo alto, brillo bajo, estroboscópico (iluminación mediante destellos) y luz ultravioleta.

Debo destacar que con la luz ultravioleta se pueden observar cosas interesantes; puedes ver brillar a algunos insectos y artrópodos, flores, moho, fluidos (deben estar secos), billetes, etc.
Datos interesantes:
Aunque laves las manos después de usar algunos productos para lavado y limpieza como el Neutrex, podrás observar con la luz UV como persiste el producto en las zonas con las que tuvo contacto.
Al colocarte protector solar, puedes ver la capa protectora que deja este sobre la piel.

La linterna incluye 3 baterías AAA, y además, se puede utilizar con baterías recargables 18650.

Espero que se mantenga intacta y resistente a través del tiempo, pero si presenta algún desperfecto o se deteriora rápidamente, actualizaré este comentario, el cual espero les haya sido útil.

review_title: This is a jewel of a pocket torch!
reviews: Bought on a whim, not expecting much at the price, for the UV function. First impression is one of a nicely built object, it feels sturdy and solid in the hand. The switch is positive and the zoom is silky smooth. The included batteries are easily loaded into the battery magazine and this slides neatly into the torch body. I put the magazine back in the way it was delivered, pressed the switch, and nothing! Having checked the polarity of the batteries, I put it in again and still nothing. Decided to look at the instructions, the diagram clearly shows that the battery magazine goes in opposite to the way it is delivered. Pressed the switch and GOOD GRIEF!!! This little beast is bright, even in a daylight lit room, it projects a wide circle of light onto a wall 8m away. It cycles through the light options on a half press of the switch, bright white, half power, flashing and UV. I am struggling to understand the few one star reviews, it does exactly what the description says, and I would suggest they are caused by user error. The torch does not work if the battery pack is the wrong way round (obvious). The torch cycles between 4 modes, one reviewer gave it 1 star because it actually does this (bizarre). The blue light contains UV, which human eyes cannot see, you can see the included blue frequencies, but they are fairly dim, it is not supposed to be used to find your way in the dark, by blue light... who would do that... but yet one reviewer gave it 1 star because she could not see much with the blue light. Point it at something that flouresces when UV impinges on it and boy does this torch light it up. Not a disco black light in your pocket but a very useful tool. I paid less than £9 for this and it is superb value, so good I have spotted that there is a 2-pack for £11 and just ordered two more. Both sons want one too. Highly recommended, well deserving of 5 stars.

reviews:

But it works fine, provides illumination and it feels fairly sturdy, if a bit cheap.

review_title: Bellissima torcia, più che decente uv.
reviews:
Per prima cosa devo dire che su amazon (al momento della pubblicazione di questa recensione) non ci sono torce uv a 365 nm, si trovano soltanto delle lampade: tutte le torce presenti sono a 395 nm. Mi serviva una luce uv a 365 per uso mineralogico (determinate specie non si vedono molto bene con una luce a 395 in quanto troppo nel visibile e dunque la luce stessa rende poco spiccata la fluorescenza che è debole in alcuni minerali). Ho dunque acquistato questo prodotto per il prezzo che è veramente molto basso e perché è sia torcia led che uv (una delle poche che non è spacciata per 365 nm, sono stati onesti dicendo che si aggira attorno ai 395).
Ha le pile incluse, 3, modalità intensa e debole della torcia led, intermittente (giudicate voi l'utilità se non far venire crisi di epilessia ai vostri amici) e uv.
La luce a led è molto potente, credo si avvicini ai 500 lumen dichiarati, la luce uv fa il suo mestiere (si vedono le tracce organiche SECCHE e i minerali rispondono bene) ma il punto di forza di questa torcia è la possibilità di concentrare il fascio di luce, in questo modo si arriva a illuminare molto lontano per una torcia tascabile da una decina di euro.
Unica pecca è che per cambiare la modalità di luce va premuto ripetutamente il tasto verde ma fortunatamente basta una leggera pressione e non un click completo.

review_title: As a flashlight, good. As a UV light to see pet urine, completely useless.
reviews: Well built, cheap flashlight. However, as a UV light to detect cat pee, it's useless. We have two dogs, five cats and a house that stinks of cat pee. All that this light can detect is bits of paper. The hunt for a cat pee detector continues.

reviews:
La Luz blanca impresiona para lo pequeña que es llega a larga distancia. En corta distancia se ve perfectamente el entorno.
Cuidado no mirarla de frente puede dañar los ojos.
Para mi cumple lo que promete.
La Luz anti manchas también funciona, aunque es más débil. Para ver bien La mancha mejor en un entorno oscuro , se ve perfectamente sábanas manchadas de pies y suciedad en los wc.
Mejoraría si utilizara pilas recargables, pero es tan pequeña que es muy cómoda para llevarla en excursiones al aire libre o en viajes. Con otro juego de 3 pilas tipo AAA listo potencial para horas y horas.
Yo tengo otra superior más voluminosa y recargable pero pesa bastante más.

#9 in Handheld Flashlights

review_title: potentissima compatta e ben rifinita vi stupirà!
reviews:
5 stelle perche a questo prezzo dubito si possa trovare di meglio..,ok chiaramente e un prodotto cinese ma non e il solito prodotto da bazar di paesino perché la qualità del led e della parabola a cupola sono piu che discrete e ha una potenza micidiale,la parte esterna e persino abbastanza curata nella zigrinatura e nella fluidità dello zoom che fa anche un bel tac netto se mosso di colpo,leggermente piu spartano l interno che puo dare piu un senso di grezzo ma nella sua semplicità permette di usare le 3 pile in dotazione in triset oppure una unica pila grossa da 3.7volt che si puo inserire dell alloggiamento a tubo trasparente,devo dire che se si stringe il fascio si arriva a distanze impressionanti per un prodotto del genere e parliamo di 350 metri e forse più dichiarati im confezione,infatti l ho puntato tranquillamente su un campanile che dista almeno 500 metri da casa mia ed è davvero un faro nella notte,a questo prezzo e a questa velocita di consegna (1 giorno)davvero nulla da dire ,ultra consigliata,anche la modalita uv e parecchio potente ed e un vero uv intenso molto molto viola ma fateci attenzione,a fissare questo tipo di luce puo dar fastidio anche se puntata in giro alla lunga puo nauseare o causare disorientamento a mio avviso,rivela tranquillamente tracce biologiche secche in giro su pavimenti e pareti e permette l essicazione di alcuni tipi di smalti o paste poliuretaniche di vario tipo sensibili agli uv(le tracce sono visibili ma solo se asciugate,la pipi dei cani appena fatta non sarà evidenziata mentre asciutta e decisamente piu probabile)in conclusione una bomba di luce che considero sia un gadget di sopravvivenza che un utility da casa per blackout o da tenere in macchina per ogni tipo di emergenza dal cambio gomme bucate o al segnalare un pericolo (il led in modalità lampeggiante puo salvare la vita)puo servire o no una torcia..e queste sono le cazzatine della vita che nolti non reputano necessarie..
ma per poco piu di 10 euro perché non averla?Top e basta

Linterna compacta y de poco peso.
luminosidad para un uso aficionado o hobby, no muy apta para uso profesional o semiprofesional.
la luz ultravioleta con poca intensidad, cuesta detectar marcas de agua en billetes de 50 euros que son los que se han probado. Se utilizo en marcaje de gato macho en celo sobre pared y no detecto nada, si detecto mi mano al pasar las yemas de los dedos.
El led principal al enfocar al suelo genera un sombra al lado del haz de luz.
consumo muy rápido de pilas alcalinas y se echa de menos batería recargable al menos 1 unidad.

#9 in Handheld Flashlights

review_title: Genial, pero puede que a tu mascota no le guste
reviews:
Necesitaba una linterna nueva para casa y busque la que tuviera los mejores comentarios. Esta era una de ellas, pero me sorprendió ver los comentarios sobre la luz ultravioleta, que sirve para ver cosas que normalmente no se ven. Gracias a la linterna, hemos descubierto que la gata no ha usado el arenero y en una habitación ha debido mojar hace tiempo la alfombra.

Mientras que a simple vista, con luz normal de sol o la luz de la linterna normal no se ve nada, al poner la luz ultravioleta, aparecen manchas que de otra forma no se ven. Espectacular. Muy recomendable y si tienes mascotas, lo siento por ellas se van a llevar más de una regañona de la que creerían que se habían librado ;-) .

review_title: Linterna para luz normal, olvídate de la UV.
reviews: La compre después de leer los comentarios porque me hacia falta para automoción y ya de paso para el trabajo, que aunque tenemos una bastante potente, hay que compartirla y a veces no está mal tener la tuya propia, en cuanto a luz UV se refiere. Una vez probada puedo decir que si vuestro uso es para la mencionada luz, olvidaros de ello, para que resulté algo efectiva tendréis que utilizarla de noche ya que con algo de luz es casi imposible aunque estéis dentro de un recinto con poca luz y la distancia tendrá que ser como mucho a unos 5 cm ya que si la alejas mucho no se verá bien la fluorescencia, como por ejemplo si es para buscar una pérdida en un motor y se encuentra en la parte baja os costará ver. El problema radica en que además de tener poca potencia en UV, al ampliar el zoom ya es casi imposible el visionario. Estoy acostumbrado a utilizar este tipo de luz en el trabajo casi a diario y se de lo que hablo. Para luz normal, esta bien, tiene potencia y alumbra mejor que algunas que tengo de la marca duracell de igual tamaño que me costaron más o menos lo mismo. El material es aluminio y el acabado está bien, no es nada exquisito pero por el precio está bien. Si la adquirís como luz ultravioleta buscar algo mejor, aunque tengáis que gastar más. No la devolveré por el precio y porque me servirá para pequeñas cosas y para usar la luz normal. El envío en Amazon un 10.

reviews:
La pillé de buena oferta y he de decir que al precio que se encontraba el producto es bueno. El foco de luz es prácticamente el mismo que el de cualquier linterna que pueda aparecerte dentro de las primeras búsquedas de Amazon, lo que sí es cierto es que pocos modelos he visto que dispongan además de luz ultravioleta y se encuentren a buen precio. Creo que eso es lo más interesante. Muchas veces tenía que ir con dos linternas, una normal y otra UV. Ahora gracias a este producto no tengo porque ir cargado con dos.

Viene con tres pilas AAA pero es compatible con baterías 18650. Si tienes pensado comprarla de antemano piensa en pillarte el cargador de las mismas porque otros modelos de linterna tienen cargador USB para la propia batería, pero esta no. Si le das mucho uso nada más que le des un par de cargas ya lo habrás amortizado. Le doy cuatro estrellas porque la pillé a 7,65€, pero si la hubiese comprado a su precio habitual le daría tres estrellas.

review_title: Un piccolo gioiellino ad un prezzo molto conveniente!
reviews:
Felice possessore di una stampante 3d in resina, spesso ho bisogno di tappare piccoli buchi o graffi causati dal processo di pulizia e levigatura delle superfici stampate; questa torcia è perfetta per lo scopo! La lunghezza d'onda per la polimerizzazione della resina è di 405nm, la torcia è 395nm ma fa comunque a meraviglia il suo dovere.
Amante anche della fotografia notturna, è perfetta per illuminare soggetti durante le lunghe esposizioni grazie ad un fascio di luce molto potente che riesce a raggiungere anche i 40 metri mantenendo una potenza più che discreta.
Grazie all'escursione della lente frontale, si riesce a cambiare raggio della luce in modo sorprendente!
Ha tre differenti modalità: Luce fissa bianca, luce intermittente e luce UV.
Con luce UV attiva si riescono a vedere anche le macchie; dettaglio interessante se avete un amico a quattro zampe e volete tener d'occhio la pulizia delle superfici.
Tascabile, il corpo della torcia è lungo circa 12 cm, un grip solido, corredata anche di laccetto per polso e passante in metallo per attaccarla alla cintura. Confermo, 3 pile AAA incluse!
Sono rimasto estasiato da questo piccolo gioiellino, soprattutto se si tiene conto del costo/beneficio!
Assolutamente ottima, la consiglio!

reviews:
Sono rimasto subito colpito dal peso e dalla robustezza del prodotto che lasciano subito intendere sia costruita bene e con materiali di qualità.
La torcia è dotata di 2 LED, uno per la luce bianca e uno per quella a raggi UV che fanno una luce davvero notevole, molto di più di quanto mi aspettassi. Comodissimo il fatto di poter avvicinare o allontanare la lente per allargare o restringere il fascio di luce.

L'unico difetto sta nel fatto che non è possibile switchare al volo da un tipo di luce all'altra, in quanto la pressione del tasto di accensione/spegnimento è impostata in modo che venga accesa prima la luce bianca fissa, poi di nuovo luce bianca fissa, poi luce bianca lampeggiante e infine luce UV. Fortunatamente non è necessario spegnere e riaccendere ogni volta la torcia per passare da una modalità all'altra in quanto è sufficiente una lieve pressione dello stesso tasto per avere lo stesso risultato. Visto il prezzo e le dimensioni molto contenute rispetto alle prestazioni, per me merita comunque le 5 stelle.

reviews:
Questa luce UV fa risaltare le otturazioni in composito in un bianco latte fluorescente. Idem per le capsule in porcellana.
A volte si ha difficoltà nel riconoscere le otturazioni più piccole, specie se sono negli spazi interdentali, o nell'essere sicuri di aver rimosso completamente un vecchio composito, anche con gli ingranditori Zeiss. Con questi UV brillano come lampadine LED.
Forse esiste una lampada dedicata all' odontoiatria con le stesse caratteristiche, ma con una piccola differenza: il suo costo non sarebbe inferiore ai 500-600 euro. Più IVA, naturalmente.
Consiglio il rivenditore di far inserire questa torcia anche nella sezione "Odontoiatria".
Per i colleghi... gli specchi per le foto endo-orali ci vengono venduti a 40-42 euro + IVA l'uno.
Qui ne ho acquistati 5 per 22 euro, con IVA e fattura elettronica.
Prima di ordinare al vostro fornitore, date un' occhiata su Amazon!

#9 in Handheld Flashlights

review_title: Ottima. Molto luminosa e ben costruita
reviews:
Questa torcia è molto luminosa, più di quanto mi aspettassi a questo prezzo. Inoltre è ben costruita e la qualità dei materiale si nota anche solo tenendola in mano o svitando il coperchio per cambiare le batterie che per quanto ho potuto constatare hanno una durata più che sufficiente anche alla massima luminosità. Intatti la torcia ha 3 modalità distinte che si selezionano ciclicamente accendendola e spegnendola ripetutamente; in ordine le modalità sono: massima luminosità, luminosità media, flash veloce a max luminosità e luce UV. La selezione delle modalità non è proprio il massimo della comodità ma fa il suo dovere senza intoppi.

PRO:
- durata batteria buona
- luminosità eccellente
- multifunzione
- possibilità di variare l'ampiezza del cono luminoso
- qualità costruttiva e dei materiali

CONTRO (ma neanche tanto)
- batteria non ricaricabile (funziona con 3 AAA oppure con una batteria al litio 18650 grazie ad un adattatore in plastica fornito nella confezione da inserire all'interno della torcia)
PS.: Le batterie non ricaricabili potrebbero anche essere un vantaggio per chi fa lunghe escursioni e invece che caricarla preferisce sostituire al volo le batterie (e poi esistono sempre le AAA ricaricabili....ah e in questo caso non preoccupatevi se sono a 1.2V invece che 1.5V perchè l'elettronica interna è fatta bene e la luminosità non cala)

Per favore vota la recensione se ti è stata utile o se ti ha chiarito qualche dubbio ;)

reviews:
Superbe lampe !!! Je ne comprends pas les commentaires qui la fustige ?!??? (ou alors vous n'avez pas eu de chance ?!?) Elle est belle et a l'air de très bonne facture. (après 2 jours d'utilisation je n'oserai en dire plus) Très lumineuse, elle fonctionne tres bien !!! Et la lampe UV, que je n'ai pas encore pu tester sur la résine UV, à une intensité que je n'aurais jamais pu espérer après avoir lu la plupart des commentaires (que je n'ai heureusement pas "écoutés"), car javoue avoir HALLUCINÉ sur l'état invisible des murs de mes toilettes !!?!??! Qui étaient presque trop visibles pour le coup (!!!!), et que jai immédiatement nettoyés !!! Et pour le coup, je me suis amusé a faire un grand tour des pièces de mon appartement !!! C'EST UN SUPER ACHAT QUE JE RECOMMANDE !!!!

Complètement d'infos :

Après l'avoir utilisée pour faire sécher de la resine UV, je peux enfin dire qu'elle fonctionne parfaitement bien pour cette application !!! Avec peut-être plus de rapidité (moins de 2 mn au lieu de 3mn) en mode zoom.

review_title: Bon Eclairage, mais très peu pratique
reviews:
La lampe torche en elle même est assez puissante et l'amplitude d'éclairage se règle assez facilement.
En revanche, ce qui est très peu pratique, c'est qu'il est impossible de choisir un mode et le conserver après extinction.
J'utilise pas mal la lumière UV par exemple et quand j'éteins et que je rallume, c'est passé au mode d'après.
Donc, obligé d'allumer puis d'appuyer 5fois pour revenir dessus... C'est vraiment agaçant.

reviews:
J'ai eu besoin d'acheter une lampe de poche pour éclairer mes allées et venues dans une cave mal éclairée et au cas où survenait une coupure d'électricité.

J'ai était agréablement surpris par la puissance et la légèreté de cette lampe. Facile à utiliser et discrète, elle est vraiment pratique.
De plus, sa petite sangle pour la suspendre est très utile.

Petit défaut en revanche au niveau de la tenue des piles dans celle ci. Elles ont tendance à bouger lors de son utilisation et font de se fait légèrement vassiller le faisceau lumineux si on bouge trop brusquement.

Je suis très content de mon achat.

reviews: Comprata che non mi serviva, solo per far aumentare l'importo dell'ordine ed avere la spedizione gratuita. Ma devo dire che sono rimasto davvero contento per la modalità UV, si vedono cose che ad occhio nudo o con luce normale non vedi. Uscito dalla doccia mi sentivo pulito, ma con la torcia puntata addosso mi sono visto pieno di pelucchi lasciati dall'accappatoio in faccia ovunque. Puntato sui denti si vedono tutte le otturazioni, sul pavimento si vedono gli angoli dove c'è piu' polvere diventare fluorescenti. Se siete amanti del pulito con questo prodotto scoprirete cose assurde... ho provato a spegnerre la lucetta del frigorifero e ad illuminare con questa torcia, ho visto cose orrende! Se utilizzate spesso i piatti per riscaldare cibi al microonde vedrete che dopo un po' la ceramica si crepa per gli sbalzi termici repentini o eccessivo calore, ad occhio nudo non si vede ma con questa torcia ne ho scoperto 2 piatti crepati. Dopo un po' stancano gli occhi alla luce violastra che emana. Funziona con 3 mini stilo.

review_title: Awesome Flashlight But Not For Pet Stains
reviews:
Let me just say this first, this is an awesome flashlight. The regular light is very powerful and bright. This is also the best flashlight I have ever owned it’s that nice!
Now if you bought this for finding pet stains you are out of luck. For pet stains you need a very high power and proper black light. This is almost powerful enough but like almost all black light flashlights it falls short. You can find reflective creatures such as scorpions with ease. And certain types of stains on slick surfaces. But the main reason I purchased this was for UV resin. This is an amazing product for just that. It cures it fast and with ease.
If you are just looking for a regular flashlight then this is for you. You can adjust the size with a push or pull of the product and it has 4 settings; bright white light (it really is white not yellow like others), a dim light, flashing light, and a nice UV light!

I highly recommend this if you need a nice flashlight but if you bought this to look for stains with the UV light feature, get a high powered proper black light bar.

review_title: I love it, I got two pieces for I think ...
reviews:
I love it, I got two pieces for I think just over $10 vor both with free shipping PRIME to Honolulu, and it works perfectly, yet so incredibly cheap!
I love the fact the it is both a white LED flashlight as well as a UV Blue Light torch that can help detect bodily fluids and scorpions and dry wood termite plugs so you can then open up the termite hiding places and squirt in some 100% D-Limonene Orange Rind Oil (100 % organic and Food Grade of course) which has helped me eliminate termites from my house even from hard to get at and very tricky to use ceiling wood panels that are directly above a KOI fish pond so I cannot risk using any toxic chemicals and having them drip into the water, and of course I have to be super careful using the 100% D-Limonene also but because it absorbs into the wood in all directions so incredibly fast and completely if you are careful there should not be any orange oil spilling down to the floor, so so far so good the fish are doing fine, and there is not so much termite poop falling down into their water, which I still have to change about once a week, you know, the KOI fish are basically carp and they eat and they poop, but they are so cute and some of the larger ones have learned to eat from my hand, priceless! And one more compliment to the flashlight, it is just the right size to fit inside a front pants pocket without being obvious that it is there, and with the zoom feature the bright white LED lighyt as almost as bright as the so called atomic flashlights which however do not have the UV blue-light feature and the front ring tends to fall off and they are obviously not really water proof but do spread the light out very evenly but they both do, this one and the atomic beam, so they can be useful as fill-lights when shooting videos with your smartphone.

review_title: Extremely useful flashlight with multiple battery options at a very reasonable price
reviews: I have owned many tactical flashlights and rarely buy any brand other than the one that is my favorite. I made an exception in the case of this flashlight and am glad I did. This flashlight was much less expensive than the ones from my favorite brand, so my expectations were commensurately lower, but I was pleasantly surprised that this light is well designed and much better than I expected. The UV function is particularly useful, and is the feature that convinced me to buy it, along with the ability to vary the output from widely dispersed to tightly concentrated. I also like the flexibility to use a high-capacity 18650 rechargeable lithium ion battery or AAA batteries. My only minor complaint is that it does not have a memory feature where the light returns to the previously used mode each time it is turned on. Instead, it always starts in the highest output mode each time it is turned on. While this is not a major problem, I hope Morpilot will consider adding a memory function in their future products.

reviews: While I bought this a couple of weeks ago when it was more money it was still worth the cost. Since I go geocaching I'm constantly looking into dark holes and even had to have a black/UV light once. This is wonderfully compact to easily fit in my fanny pack go-bag or clips easily on my belt. It's saved me from having to reach into dark spots or waste precious cell phone battery life to look for caches. I like that I can control the beam from wide to narrow and the UV option is great for those specialty caches but also for checking out your hotel rooms and or anything else for UV/black light-based. I was a little hesitant that the black/uv light portion wouldn't be that strong but was pleasantly surprised. I brought it with me on a recent kayak trip (just for general safety/EDC especially because it has a blinking light feature) and it wound up getting a little more wet than it should have when I tipped over and the "dry bag" didn't keep things too dry and I was so happy to see that it survived and functions perfectly after getting wet.

review_title: It works, but sometimes Ignorance is bliss.
reviews:
This light is dual mode, with both white light and UV light, which is extra handy. But you're probably considering this light mainly because it is UV. I was skeptical, but the UV part does what they say it will do. However, sometimes you may not want to know what you can't see with the naked eye. We have a cabin in the woods that has a "few" mice. If you want to check for mouse spoor, this thing will do the trick. You may wish you hadn't looked though.

What makes this light extra practicable though, and one reason that I selected it over other flashlights, is the dual mode. Because let's face it, a white light is usually more useful than a UV one. The white light is bright enough that this flashlight would be a good deal even if it only had white light. But with the UV capability, it's the "Two birds" thing.

Another feature of this light that I consider noteworthy is that you can run it on 3 AAA batteries, or one 18650 battery. If you are not familiar with them, 18650s are powerful and robust rechargeable batteries. Many high end lights now use them due to their power and long run time. As far as I know, all 18650 batteries are also lithium ion, which means they can be recharged hundreds, if not thousands of times, and they have excellent shelf life, unlike older types of rechargeable batteries. FYI, this light will also run on a 16650, which is like the 18650, just a tad thinner. They are sometimes hard to find, but 16650s also fit into the older Surefire G2 flashlights.

As well as this thing works for mouse urine, I have every reason to believe it will work in other places, like hotel rooms, which makes me shutter at the thought based on the stories I have heard. Just sayin'!

I've read that UV light doesn't work too well on cat urine for some reason. I have cats, but apparently they've behaved themselves, or cat urine really doesn't fluoresce very much.

This light is focusable as well, so you can shine it back into dark corners. I suspect that would make this flashlight a very affordable and effective scorpion locater, if that's your thing.

I bought this light to help follow blood trails after dark, just in case. I have not tried it for that use. However, based on how well it works in other instances, I think it will work as well for that as any other affordable UV light out there.

This UV light is like a super power, use it wisely, you've been warned! LOL!
product_name: Morpilot UV Flashlight, LED Handheld Flashlight 2 in 1 Black Light Flashlight Waterproof Blacklight Flashlights, LED UV Torch Urine Detector for Cats Pet Stains Bed Bugs Scorpions

review_title: Focused, expensive, powerful UV for little money
reviews:
Ok, so this flashlight delivers focused beam of UV that is probably 10 times more powerful than the normal ubiquitous pet urine detector $3 light with ten or so LEDs.

This is much, much more quality here and function. Comes with a plastic shell if you decide to buy the Morpilot Lithium battery, which, curiously is absent from their website among about 50 other batteries that they sell.

I used this to highlight the automotive AC UV tracer, and it does so beautifully. Highlights organic matter just as well.
I would highly recommend this one for the function/aesthetics/quality at a still very low price combination.

As always, never keep modern batteries inside anything, - they will leak and destroy.

reviews: I needed a small flashlight to go camping and came across the morpilot flashlight. What made me get it was the addition of the UV light. UV light is perfect for finding hidden scorpions; they glow bright green. After getting back from camping, i'm so glad i got this light! First of all, the light is very bright. SUPER bright! You can adjust the light from small zoomed in wide zoomed out. Toggling the on/off button, you get a second light that is about 50% less bright than the first option. Toggling again you get a strobe light. And once again, you get to the UV light. I have no need to check for pee stains using the UV light so i can't talk to its usefulness. But the UV light is pretty cool. We were able to find scorpions in nature when the sun had gone down. You also find other cool things like certain rocks that glow a special way that you normally couldn't see. The light comes with a AAA adapter and a plastic holder tube if you're using a 18650 rechargeable battery. I tried both the AAA batteries and the 18650 battery and the latter was brighter. I like having the AAA battery adapter as charging the 18650 battery was not possible during camping. The build is very solid; probably military grade. Overall i'm really happy with the flashlight and would definitely buy it again if i had to replace it.

review_title: Way way WAY better than I am expected!!
reviews: I am so pumped about this. It comes with 3 triple a batteries, which is cool, or you have the option of taking out the battery holder, and put in the clear tube and putting in an 18650 battery ( which I have several because I vape lol) and of course you’re going to get a brighter light and longer battery life with the 18650, but you get a really bright light with triple a’s as well. This thing is awesome, it is exceptionally bright, and it has 4 modes. Bright, low,(which is still bright) strobe(which will just about blind someone and I recommend strobe as part of a home defense plan, and it also has UV mode which is really useful (especially if you have cats that don’t always use their litter box lol). It is also a pretty sturdy little light, feels like it’s made of a lighter metal, and feels great in the hand. I was looking at other lights on amazon, but decided with this, because it has UV mode. It does get pretty hot if it’s on high and you run it for over 10 minutes but that’s the only negative which isn’t really even a negative for me. Seriously I CANNOT RECOMMEND THIS ENOUGH!!! And the best part is the price. If you’re looking for a light, and are stuck between a few, go for this one, it blew me away.

reviews:
I bought this primarily for the UV usage and the white light was an added plus.
It has a good wide beam, but when focusing all the way in the shape of the light is square (both white and UV).
Higher quality UV lights make use of a round chip to keep the shape but this does not effect the usefulness for me at longer ranges or tighter spots.
Also at full wide you can see a slight green glow at the edge of the light beam and this is due to the construction using a UV reactive glue to secure the lens, but again does not effect the usefulness for me.

The biggest disadvantage that I see is that since there must be two LED chips used for UV and white, the lens is not optimized to correct for this so at near to full to full focus you can clearly see that the light does not project straight out from the light but is offset by about 5 degrees.

All in all for the price, this light cannot be beat and is a great purchase. If more precision or cleaner light is needed you will need to spend more money to get what you want.

review_title: Faulty mode switching after less than a year
reviews:
Bought this to help identify where the cats may have been spraying. In places where I know they urinated a bit on carpet it showed nothing. So a big fail on the purpose I bought it for. However I'm giving it 4 stars, because it's utility; slimness, brightness, modes, and efficiency as a flashlight for the price makes it an excellent replacement for the old bulkier one I regularly use when venturing into the crawl space.

UPDATE: Less than a year into owning and very infrequent use I've noticed that the slightest bump to this flashlight now changes the mode it's on. A real pain if you're rolling around in a crawl space and having it go to black light mode by simply setting it down. I need to turn it off and wait for 5 seconds before turning it on again to "reset" it. Slightest touch to the button also causes the light modes to start looping. It used to be a solid medium touch that was hard to accidentally trigger the mode switch.

reviews: Overall a very good light. I use it for work (public safety) and home use. I mostly use it to check ID's with the UV light and to check mildly lit areas. The adjustable zoom is a good feature. Quality is good but not bad especially for the price of the light. Dropped the light multiple times at about 3 feet high on hard surfaces like tile and concrete. The light still works. But some times there is a slight flicker for the LED that's is barely noticeable. Just a hard tap to the light and it stops. Overall good performance to price ratio. Best used with high performance/high mAh Li-Ion 18650 batteries. Remember its only 500 lumens with an18650 Li-Ion battery.

review_title: Perfect for my job in a cave!!
reviews:
I literally bought four different flashlights before finding this one, and I wish I’d seen this one first. I work in a cave, so I need a backup flashlight, and also a UV light to show the phosphorescence of some of the formations. The ones I bought previously just sucked. They weren’t anywhere near as bright as I needed them to be. This one, though. You turn this sucker on and suddenly it’s light you just turned on a tiny sun in the room. It. Is. BRIGHT. (But can also be dimmed if you need it.) The UV light is also astoundingly bright, too. It REALLY makes a difference. I also love the fact that you can use either AAA batteries OR a 18650, if you want. I prefer the 18650, but you’re still gonna get a ridiculously bright light with AAA. The telescoping on this light is super nice, too. The lens has a super convex curve to it, which allows for some super stellar magnification. My only complaint* (if you ever wanna call it that; this is like splitting hairs), is that I wish the UV light came before the strobe, and that there was an option for a UV laser pointer! But, like I said, that’s me being stupid picky. I’ve already recommended this light to ALL of my coworkers, and a couple of them have ordered it, too! It really is the best little light you’ll ever own.

*WARNING: There is only one other downside to this, though it may not affect everyone. The strobe light is VERY fast and intense. If you’re prone to seizures, that’s a function you’ll need to cover up as you cycle through them. It doesn’t affect me any, but I can see how it’s be damaging to some.

If you will be using the UV mode, you will want to stick with the 3xAAA setup.
